TextView.android:text: Welcome to the Amazing Bite Counter App!

It's Simple. Every time you put food in your mouth or take a drink, tap the circle. Water doesn't count. Everything else does, everything. 

For the next 7 days just eat as you normally do. Get in the habit of counting your bites while the app establishes a baseline. 

After 7 days the app will create a target to aim for. Each day try to hit your target without going over. Eat what you want, when you want it, just less. 

Will it be annoying? Guaranteed. It's going to be hard. But totally worth it. Once it's a habit you're on your way. 

Can I set my own target? For sure. Just click on settings and enter your preferred target number. 

What about nutrition? This app can't do it all for you... As you track your overall food intake, steer yourself toward more healthy choices.
